justification: “The Empathy Selection Task [6] is a behavioral paradigm wherein people choose between completing an empathy task … Work with this task has demonstrated that, over a series of trials, people are less likely to choose the empathy deck.”

measured_by: retrospective self-efficacy rating after the Empathy deck
justification: “Across many studies, we find that retrospectively reported self-efficacy during the empathy deck is related to one’s willingness to choose the empathy deck at all.”
